item.title: 2021#11 Readings
item.description: Having to tweak a presentation for the Data+AI Summit time constraints has eaten all my disposable free time, hence the posting hiatus and this being relatively short.

item.title: 2021#09 Readings
item.description: Looks like my mojo is coming back.

item.title: 2021#08 Readings
item.description: This edition is kind of strange: there’s more management than “code”.

item.title: 2020#04 Readings
item.description: Not sure what I did this past week aside from finishing a post: I read very little.

item.title: 2020#63 Readings
item.description: This looks like a less hard technical edition than usual.

item.title: 2019#35 Readings of the Week
item.description: A flight last Sunday meant I was so sleepy I skipped sending last week’s newsletter… so this week is super-sized. A lot of content about distributed teams I think.

item.title: 2019#34 Readings of the Week
item.description: This week is somewhat more eclectic than usual. There is nothing about any particular programming language. There is a bit on Kubernetes, functional programming and containers, project management, aviation history, interviews/bios… I have started reading a few more papers, and I’ll share the interesting ones as well. This week they are centered in data engineering.
